Bible Reading Plans & Daily Devotionals

Dive deep into God's Word with structured reading plans designed for healing, growth, and understanding. All plans work offline.

Featured Reading Plans

30 Days

Healing from Shame: 30-Day Journey

A Scripture-based journey to find freedom from shame through God's Word. Discover God's love and acceptance in Psalms, Isaiah, and the Gospels.

Chapter by chapter study of Revelation, understanding the symbols, prophecies, and the ultimate victory of Christ. Aligned with SDA interpretation.

Bible Study Tips

Start with Prayer

Before diving into Scripture, ask the Holy Spirit to open your heart and mind to receive God's truth. Prayer prepares us to hear from God through His Word.

Read in Context

Understanding the historical and cultural context helps us interpret Scripture accurately. Consider who wrote it, when, and to whom it was written.

Apply Personally

Ask yourself: "What is God saying to me through this passage?" Look for practical ways to apply biblical truths to your daily life and relationships.

Study Consistently

Regular, consistent study is more beneficial than occasional long sessions. Even 10-15 minutes daily can transform your relationship with God.
